name: [AGJ2018] Dungeon Arcade
description:
Archon Game Jam 2018

Theme: Dungeon Arcade

  • Boss Rush
  • Retro Monsters
  • Game Pad support

Controls:

Player 1:

WASD - movement

B - attack

N - roll

M - jump

1 - Revive

Player 2:

Arrow Keys- movement

Num 1 - attack

Num 2 - roll

Num 3 - jump

2 - Revive
